-- Criar tabela de uso de LLM
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS llm_usage (
  id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  ts TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
  workflow_id TEXT NOT NULL,
  workflow_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  run_id TEXT NOT NULL,
  node_name TEXT,
  provider TEXT NOT NULL,
  model TEXT NOT NULL,
  input_tokens INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  output_tokens INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  total_tokens INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  latency_ms INTEGER,
  status TEXT DEFAULT 'success',
  region TEXT DEFAULT 'BR-SP',
  user_id TEXT,
  cost_usd NUMERIC(12,6) DEFAULT 0
);

-- Criar tabela de preços dos modelos
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS model_pricing (
  provider TEXT NOT NULL,
  model TEXT NOT NULL,
  prompt_price_per_1k NUMERIC(12,6) NOT NULL,
  completion_price_per_1k NUMERIC(12,6) NOT NULL,
  currency TEXT DEFAULT 'USD',
  PRIMARY KEY (provider, model)
);

-- Inserir preços dos modelos OpenAI (atualize conforme necessário)
INSERT INTO model_pricing (provider, model, prompt_price_per_1k, completion_price_per_1k) VALUES
('openai', 'gpt-4o-mini', 0.00015, 0.0006),
('openai', 'gpt-4o', 0.005, 0.015),
('openai', 'gpt-4-turbo', 0.01, 0.03),
('openai', 'gpt-3.5-turbo', 0.0005, 0.0015),
('openai', 'text-embedding-3-small', 0.00002, 0.00002),
('openai', 'text-embedding-3-large', 0.00013, 0.00013)
ON CONFLICT (provider, model) DO UPDATE SET
  prompt_price_per_1k = EXCLUDED.prompt_price_per_1k,
  completion_price_per_1k = EXCLUDED.completion_price_per_1k;

-- Criar view com custo calculado
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_llm_usage_cost AS
SELECT
  u.*,
  COALESCE(u.input_tokens,0)/1000.0 * COALESCE(p.prompt_price_per_1k,0)
  + COALESCE(u.output_tokens,0)/1000.0 * COALESCE(p.completion_price_per_1k,0)
  AS total_cost_usd,
  CASE WHEN u.total_tokens = 0 THEN 0
       ELSE (COALESCE(u.input_tokens,0)/1000.0 * COALESCE(p.prompt_price_per_1k,0)
             + COALESCE(u.output_tokens,0)/1000.0 * COALESCE(p.completion_price_per_1k,0))
             / (u.total_tokens/1000.0)
  END AS usd_per_k_token
FROM llm_usage u
LEFT JOIN model_pricing p
  ON p.provider = u.provider
 AND p.model = u.model;

-- Query para relatório de custo por workflow (últimos 7 dias)
SELECT 
  workflow_name,
  COUNT(*) as executions,
  SUM(total_tokens) as total_tokens,
  AVG(total_tokens) as avg_tokens_per_run,
  SUM(total_cost_usd) as total_cost_usd,
  AVG(total_cost_usd) as avg_cost_per_run,
  AVG(usd_per_k_token) as avg_usd_per_k_token
FROM v_llm_usage_cost
WHERE ts >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
GROUP BY workflow_name
ORDER BY total_cost_usd DESC;

{
  "custo_por_fluxo_diario": "SELECT date_trunc('day', ts) AS day, workflow_name, SUM(total_cost_usd) AS cost_usd FROM v_llm_usage_cost WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY 1 ASC",
  "tokens_media_diaria": "SELECT date_trunc('day', ts) AS day, AVG(total_tokens) AS avg_tokens_per_run FROM llm_usage WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 ASC",
  "custo_semanal": "SELECT date_trunc('week', ts) AS bucket, SUM(total_cost_usd) AS cost_usd FROM v_llm_usage_cost WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1",
  "custo_mensal": "SELECT date_trunc('month', ts) AS bucket, SUM(total_cost_usd) AS cost_usd FROM v_llm_usage_cost WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1",
  "top_workflows_caros": "SELECT workflow_name, SUM(total_cost_usd) AS cost_7d FROM v_llm_usage_cost WHERE ts >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY cost_7d DESC LIMIT 10",
  "custo_por_1k_tokens": "SELECT date_trunc('day', ts) AS day, provider || '|' || model AS model_key, CASE WHEN SUM(total_tokens) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(total_cost_usd) / (SUM(total_tokens)/1000.0) END AS usd_per_k_token FROM v_llm_usage_cost WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY 1",
  "kpis_30d": "SELECT SUM(total_cost_usd) as total_cost_30d, SUM(total_tokens) as total_tokens_30d, AVG(usd_per_k_token) as avg_cost_per_k_token_30d, COUNT(*) as total_executions_30d FROM v_llm_usage_cost WHERE ts >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'"
}
